John,

Thank you for all you have done in providing content and code for helping folks get better at what they do. Thanks also for your inspiration in becoming a focal point for helping developers with great content and, in part, inspiring me to blog and now podcast.

I have recently launched a podcast with interviews with successful software people where I focus on stories and learning about the developers and how they deliver value. It would be great if I could get you to share 45ish minutes with me to do an interview for the show.

To find out more about what I’m doing, here is my blog post about the podcast: http://optimizedprogrammer.com/blog/my-podcast-is-live

and here is the site: http://developeronfire.com/

Please let me know if you’d be interested.
